product_overview: A decentralized freelance task management platform integrating blockchain technology, Ethereum smart contracts, and advanced cryptographic validation to enable secure, transparent, and flexible work collaboration with client-freelancer role dynamics.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication with Google OAuth via Firebase.
Provide full CRUD operations for freelance tasks with detailed attributes such as categories, budgets, deadlines, and required skills.
Allow clients to approve files individually, supporting partial payments proportional to approvals.
Implement zero-knowledge proof based cryptographic validation for file submissions ensuring privacy without content exposure.
Support multi-file upload and management with detailed status tracking and approval workflows.
Integrate Ethereum blockchain for wallet connection, escrow payments, and smart contract interactions to manage payments transparently.
Manage user roles dynamically, allowing switching between client and freelancer with role-specific permissions and UI.
Provide real-time updates for submissions, approvals, and payments reflecting live changes without manual refresh.
Deliver a modern and accessible UI using React, Radix UI components, TailwindCSS, and responsive design principles.
Implement robust routing, error handling, loading states, and onboarding experience with celebratory animations.
key_features: Firebase Authentication System with Google OAuth and token-based authorization.
Task Management System supporting creation, viewing, editing, and deletion of freelance tasks.
Partial Approval System enabling file-wise approvals and proportional payment calculation.
Zero-Knowledge Proof (ZKP) system for secure, privacy-preserving file validation.
Multi-file Submission and Management system with status tracking and secure downloads.
Ethereum blockchain integration for wallet connection (MetaMask), escrow payments, and smart contract interactions.
Payment Claim System allowing proportional ETH payment claims based on approved files.
Dynamic User Role Management to switch between client and freelancer with role-specific UI and permissions.
Real-time Status Updates for submission status, approvals, and payment claims with auto-refresh.
Advanced UI with Radix UI components, TailwindCSS styling, and responsive, accessible design.
Multi-page Navigation with protected routes, mobile-friendly menus, and user-specific layout.
Loading and Error Handling mechanisms providing user feedback and robust experience.
Welcome and Onboarding flow with celebratory animations for new users.
user_flow_summary: User registers or signs in using Google OAuth via Firebase authentication.
User selects or switches role between client and freelancer, accessing role-specific dashboards.
Clients create freelance tasks specifying categories, budgets, deadlines, and desired skills.
Freelancers browse tasks and submit multiple files per task via the submission interface.
Files submitted undergo zero-knowledge proof validation to verify authenticity without revealing content.
Clients review submissions and approve individual files, triggering proportional payment calculations.
Approved payments can be claimed by freelancers through Ethereum blockchain escrow with wallet integration.
All actions and statuses update in real-time ensuring users see latest submission, approval, and payment states.
Users navigate through a multi-page React app with protected routes and responsive UI components.
New users experience onboarding with welcome greetings and celebratory animations upon first login.
validation_criteria: Successful Google OAuth authentication and user management via Firebase.
Full CRUD functionality is verified for task creation, editing, viewing, and deletion.
Partial approval workflows function correctly with accurate proportional payment calculations.
Zero-knowledge proof validation effectively confirms file integrity without content exposure.
Multi-file uploads and status tracking are reliable and reflect current approval states.
Ethereum wallet connection and blockchain escrow payments are functional with secure transactions.
Dynamic role switching updates UI and permissions appropriately without errors.
Real-time updates display fresh submission, approval, and payment information seamlessly.
UI components are responsive, accessible, and visually consistent across devices.
Routing protects pages based on authentication and role with no unauthorized access.
Loading states and error handling provide clear user feedback under all conditions.
Onboarding flow triggers only for new users and displays expected celebratory effects.
